name: Spicy New Mexico Fish
author: CINDYSI
summary: Green chiles from Hatch, New Mexico are a staple cooking ingredient in the state. I order my chiles online from Bueno Foods. Serve with hot rice!
ingredients: ½ cup diced hot Hatch green chiles
½  jalapeno pepper, minced, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine tomatoes, green chiles, sugar, garlic, jalapeno, salt, and black pepper in a saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low; add zucchini
Simmer until sauce is combined, 5 to 10 minutes
Place halibut steaks in a shallow casserole dish; pour sauce on top
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes
